Html: It seems that during optimization the program calculates in the meta gem without accounting for the required gems.  i.e.. If I have an chaotic skyfire diamond it reaquires 2 blue gems however the optimizer does not equip my gear with any blue, purple, or green gems even though I have them selected and it looks as though it grants me the bonus of the meta gem without having those gems equipped.  Is this true?
On the Options tab, check the box for Enforce Metagem Requirements.
I actually tried that however that seems unavailable.  The program doesn't allow me to check that box.
Hmm... Did Arnath forget to include it or something? As a workaround, switch to a different model (Cat or something), check the box, then switch back.
